title: US lab stands on threshold of key nuclear fusion goal
description: A US science institute is on the verge of achieving a longstanding goal in nuclear fusion research.

title: Nubya Garcia: The British sax star who is jazzing up the BBC Proms
description: Saxophonist Nubya Garcia on playing Royal Albert Hall, the Mercury Prize and "natural vibrations".

title: 'I make art out of discarded face masks'
description: Thomas Yates posts artwork he's created out of used face masks on social media.

title: Covid: 'I'm pregnant, should I have the vaccine?'
description: Many pregnant women have declined the Covid jab, but what's best for the baby?

title: Afghanistan: The 'pure devastation and guilt' of British-Afghans

title: How latte art in South Africa led to a job from hell in Oman
description: A South African barista was offered a dream opportunity in Oman but unknowingly signed away his freedoms.

title: Never mind going electric, where will we park?
description: UK roads are already jam-packed and that looks set to get worse as more people snap up EVs.

title: The little-known human stories behind emoji designs

title: Trendy shoffices and pizza ovens raised lockdown fire risks
description: Insurer Zurich says residential outbuilding fires rose by 16% last year compared with 2019.

description: Planes equipped with infrared scanners are helping authorities take on historic wildfires in the US.

title: Art: Paintings by Sir Kyffin Williams sell for £42,900
description: The artworks, by one of Wales' most renowned artists, are described as "a truly wonderful find".

title: Ex-marine: I'm not leaving Kabul without my animal rescue staff
description: Founder of an animal sanctuary Pen Farthing urges ministers to get 71 people to safety in the UK.

title: California man sues after being startled by dumpster-diving bear
description: A dumpster-diving bear allegedly "startled" the man and caused him to fall and hurt himself.

title: Afghan women to have rights within Islamic law, Taliban say
description: The militant group, which has taken control of Afghanistan, is pressed on fears over women's freedoms.

title: Greater Manchester Police chief scraps 'tosh' Citizens' Contract
description: Stephen Watson says a scheme defending squeezed police resources was "patronising nonsense".

title: Magic Jones pulls victory out of the hat for Phoenix in winner-takes-all tie with Superchargers
description: Eve Jones stars as Birmingham Phoenix all-but secure a place in the women's Hundred eliminator with a win over Northern Superchargers.

title: France wildfire: Thousands evacuated as blaze rages near Riviera
description: Firefighters clear campsites in the Var region as some 5,000 hectares are destroyed by fire.

title: Astronomers see galaxies in ultra-high definition
description: Researchers capture some of the most detailed images ever seen of galaxies in deep space.

title: Plymouth gunman had lockdown mental health help
description: Jake Davison, who killed five people in Plymouth, used a mental health helpline, the NHS says.

title: Nando's shuts restaurants as it runs short of supplies
description: The chain says it will lend some of its own staff to its suppliers, to help tackle delays to deliveries.

title: Covid-vaccine scientists begin plague-jab trial
description: The first volunteers have received a dose of the vaccine, made using the same technology as the Covid jab.

title: Afghanistan: UK's Kabul evacuation operating at full pace - commander
description: The changing political situation means "we can't afford to pause and wait", Vice Adm Sir Ben Key says.

description: A photo appears to show hundreds of Afghans packed on a US military plane as they flee the Taliban.

title: The Hundred: Eve Jones takes stunning catch to dismiss Lauren Winfield-Hill
description: Birmingham Phoenix's Eve Jones takes a stunning catch to dismiss Northern Superchargers' Lauren Winfield-Hill on 64 at Headingley in The Hundred.

title: Taliban: 'We will not allow the soil of Afghanistan to be used against anyone'
description: The Taliban have held their first news conference since taking control of Afghanistan.

title: Covid: Moderna jab approved for 12 to 17s and summer schools make up for lost time
description: Five things you need to know about the coronavirus pandemic this Tuesday evening.
